Package controller

Class StaffController

java.lang.Object
controller.StaffController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/staff") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173") public class StaffController extends Object
REST controller for Career Center Staff operations. Handles authorization and approval workflows.
Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6

      @GetMapping("/reports") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse<Map<String,Object>>> generateReport(@RequestParam String staffId, @RequestParam(required=false) String major, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer year, @RequestParam(required=false) String companyName, @RequestParam(required=false) String startDate, @RequestParam(required=false) String endDate, @RequestParam(required=false) String applicationStatus, @RequestParam(required=false) String internshipLevel, @RequestParam(required=false) String internshipStatus)

      Parameters:
      staffId - The staff member's ID
      major - Optional major filter
      year - Optional year filter
      companyName - Optional company name filter
      startDate - Optional start date filter
      endDate - Optional end date filter
      applicationStatus - Optional application status filter
      internshipLevel - Optional internship level filter
      internshipStatus - Optional internship status filter
      Returns:
      Report data with statistics
